metadata.name: Pleroma Rotorelief #1
metadata.description:
Pleroma Rotorelief #1 
2022
GIF image - 1min.
52MB
950x534

PLEROMA ROTORELIEFS by the artist Margarida Sardinha is a 25 unique GIF images NFT project concerning orbital movement in closed systems. It underlies notions of inertia and angular momentum in space making a contrast between the two as optical illusions.
